parameters.name: hospitalName
parameters.description: Hospital Name. Eg, HospitalA or HospitalB

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The logical resource id for the CarePlan

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Patient id of the owner of the CarePlan

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Who care plan is for. Must represent a Patient resource.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The scope of care plan being searched for. Examples: category=assess-plan

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The encounter id of the care plan

parameters.name: hospitalName
parameters.description: Hospital Name. Eg, HospitalA or HospitalB

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The logical resource id associated with the Goal.

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient who has the goal.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject who this goal is intended for. Must represent a Patient resource.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date of the date range which to find goals.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date of the date range which to find goals.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Goal status.Eg: in-progress, achieved, or cancelled
